roleset.name: to put or set into, between, or among, putting into/between
roleset.note: INSERT-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of VNcls put-9.1-1. (from insert.01-v)

example.name: passive
example.text: At Plant Genetic Systems , researchers have isolated a pollen-inhibiting gene that-1 [*T*-1]-20 can be inserted [*-20]in a plant [*] to confer male sterility .

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Congress inserted the following into the Interior appropriation : `` None of the funds available under this title may be used [*-1] [*]to prepare reports on contacts between employees of the Dept. of the Interior and Members and committees of Congress and their staff . ''

example.name: All Args
example.text: Her insertion of the key into the rusty old lock made a loud clattering noise.
